problem.markdown: >>According to your textbook, Psychology is best defined as:<< (!) the study of the mind (x) the study of the mind and behavior () the study of behavior () the study of the biology of the mind () the study of why people do what they do
problem.p: According to your textbook, Psychology is best defined as:

choicegroup.label: According to your textbook, Psychology is best defined as:
choicegroup.choice: the study of the mind and behavior
the study of the biology of the mind
the study of why people do what they do
